name: Where is Mr Cloud
description:
Where is Mr Cloud is a 2d mystery solving game. In this game where you are about to find our main character Toprak's lost plush toy, You will wander around, explore various places, find clues and finally find out who took Mr Cloud.

In this game, you can explore the house where Toprak lives, You can search chests, cabinets, tables, even under pillows. You can save every clue you find and open the review menu to review later. And finally you can identify the real culprit.
